padding--x-xs.description: Adds a tiny amount of padding to the left and right.

padding--x-sm.description: Adds a small amount of padding to the left and right.

padding--x-md.title: Medium horizontal padding
padding--x-md.description: Adds a medium amount of padding to the left and right.

padding--x-lg.description: Adds a large amount of padding to the left and right.

padding--x-xl.title: Extra-large horizontal padding
padding--x-xl.description: Adds an extra-large amount of padding to the left and right.
